Header.title: LB Dist.
Header.paragraph: Growing the dankest between the Rockies and the Mississippi

About.paragraph: Are you kidding? This is a family-owned, small business supporting injured war veterans. With decades of in-house experience, we bring you the best herb at the best prices.

Features.title: Gary Payton
Features.text: 50/50 Hybrid of the dankest you ever had

Features.title: Ice Cream Cake
Features.text: Indica Dominant, Hybrid. Get it before it melts... your FACE

Features.title: Gorilla Glue #4
Features.text: Sativa Dominant hybrid. The first three attempts were so sticky, their owners could never leave the couch!

Features.title: Orange Cookies
Features.text: Indica dominant hybrid. Yum yum city right here. Get those num nums for gam gams.
